metadata.title: Maritime ministry to hold workshop on Jan 24

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 21 (APP):Ministry of Maritime Affairs, in consultation with the public and private sector stake-holders, has formulated draft of the National Maritime Policy (NMP), 2025. In this regard, the Ministry has arranged a workshop for finalization of the said draft to seek input on January 24, 2025. Federal Minister of Maritime Affairs, Qaiser Ahmed Sheikh will be the chief guest on the occasion, said a press release.
